content: 5th-year {{Computer & Network Engineering}} student at EMSI with a background in {{Cybersecurity}}.
I hold a {{Specialized Technician}} diploma in Cybersecurity from ISTA and have hands-on experience through internships at {{HPS}}, {{CIH}}, and {{ITPay}}.
Started with {{security}} and {{penetration testing}}, I've grown increasingly interested in {{DevOps}} and infrastructure automation.
Current focus: {{Creation, configuration and maintenance}} of information systems, {{CI/CD automation}}, and modern DevOps practices.
Passionate about {{virtualization}} and {{hypervisors}}, I love working with virtual infrastructure and containerized environments to build flexible, efficient systems.
Connect with me on LinkedIn or explore my work on GitHub.
Feel free to reach out at sohaibmokhliss@gmail.com or call {{0679035810}}
